context: Adenotonsillectomy. Recurrent tonsillitis. The adenoid bed was examined and was moderately hypertrophied. Adenoid curettes were used to remove this tissue and packs placed.   (Medical Transcription Sample Report)
under general endotracheal anesthesia in supine position, the table turned and a McIvor mouthgag placed.
